plot: Shows us first hand, the demise of a relationship and the uncomfortable dialogue, which often springs from a break-up. Truths comes out, people get hurt and we say goodbye...maybe forever.
title: Up & Down
plot_es: Shows us first hand, the demise of a relationship and the uncomfortable dialogue, which often springs from a break-up. Truths comes out, people get hurt and we say goodbye...maybe forever.
plot_en: Shows us first hand, the demise of a relationship and the uncomfortable dialogue, which often springs from a break-up. Truths comes out, people get hurt and we say goodbye...maybe forever.
